title: Instructional Design Strategies for Improving Trust Experience in Online Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform proficiency and understanding of social interaction
context.additional_context: Learners are office workers (administrative/managerial) with intermediate-level social domain expertise, provided with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three methods to enhance self-trust when designing online courses
Learners can apply semi-structured interview techniques to build trust with faculty members
Learners can develop concrete action plans to enhance organizational trust at the institutional level
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
